data.message: dear sir Eminem ! as a single mum from Belgium with a daughter and son (having a childhood not quiet like how childhood should have been - but with you as an unexpected roll model example !!! I want to ask you .... please check out fiction (jari) my son, who wants to do a song with you (he really doesn 't know anything about what I am asking you now !!!) but when he was about 7-8 years old (and this is for real !!!) he did A CAPELLA !!! Loose yourself ..... I was lightnened by thunder and lightening !! (don't even know if I say this correctely because I am belgian !!  recentely my son is into puch out battles in Rotterdam. but what I really'd like is  ... and it 's really one of my big dreams !!! is you to contact him to tell him he is the best rapper of Belgium !! which he actually is and that you want to record a song featuring him <3
